dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, these Special Public Service Centers in Kazakhstan are now using facial recognition to verify people's identities automatically.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, these Special Public Service Centers in Kazakhstan are now using facial recognition to verify people's identities automatically.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Special Public Service Centers (Special PSCs) in Kazakhstan have begun using facial recognition technology to automatically verify the identity of visitors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, wow, so they're taking a photo of your face and comparing it to the national database?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, wow, so they're taking a photo of your face and comparing it to the national database?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to "Government for Citizens," the system now takes a photograph of the applicant's face and compares it with the image stored in the national database of individuals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, um, before this, staff had to check documents manually, which was slower and, you know, more prone to human error or fraud.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, um, before this, staff had to check documents manually, which was slower and, you know, more prone to human error or fraud.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, identity verification was done manually by PSC staff who checked documents in person.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, like someone could use a fake ID or even just a photo on their phone screen.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, like someone could use a fake I D or even just a photo on their phone screen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The new process is intended to prevent the use of fake or third-party images, including photos displayed on phone screens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, and now if the system can't match your face with the database, it just blocks the service request entirely.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, and now if the system can't match your face with the database, it just blocks the service request entirely.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If the system fails to confirm a person's identity using biometrics, the service request is automatically blocked.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's pretty strict—so no manual override at all?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's pretty strict-so no manual override at all?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Seems like it's fully automated for that step. But they do remind people they can use eGov.kz or the mobile app instead.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seems like it's fully automated for that step. But they do remind people they can use the website or the mobile app instead.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Authorities remind citizens that government services can also be accessed via the eGov.kz portal, the PSC mobile app (Government for Citizens), and second-tier bank applications.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, the Government for Citizens app—I remember they recently added something for recognizing foreign diplomas too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, the Government for Citizens app-I remember they recently added something for recognizing foreign diplomas too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, a new feature allowing users to apply for the recognition of foreign higher and postgraduate education diplomas was added to the eGov Mobile app.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's right, the eGov Mobile app. So there are alternatives if, uh, the facial recognition doesn't work for someone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's right, the eGov Mobile app. So there are alternatives if, uh, the facial recognition doesn't work for someone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Still, it's a big shift toward automation. I wonder how accurate the system is.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, it's a big shift toward automation. I wonder how accurate the system is.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure—biometrics can be tricky with lighting, angles, all that. But it's definitely a step up from forged documents.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure-biometrics can be tricky with lighting, angles, all that. But it's definitely a step up from forged documents.
